Articles.Content:
so no mods and am running the latest beta. 0.1.1.0 ksp2. i build rocket i launch said rocket i land back on kerbin go to build another rocket cannot launch the rocket at this point imust save second rocket and restart the game completely load the same second rocket and am able to launch

amd ryzen 9 7900x

32gb ram

rtx nvidia 4070ti

rog strix b650e-f gaming +wifi w/ pci-express 5.0

Edited May 11, 2023 by rangerdanger385

just letting you guys know and this wasnt just a one time thing it was a back to back thing . start, build, launch, build, no launch, save build, restart, load build, launch, build, no launch, save build, restart, load build, launch.
Your not alone on this. Have also had the same bug several times were the launch button not working. Restart seems the only way to fix it for now.
